name: Random Golf
description:
Playing a golf is pretty fun, but what if we mix a randomness into it?

"Random Golf" is a game where "Golf" and "Randomeness" are put together. Travel through levels full of obstacles, and besides them, the only enemy standing on your way is a roll of the dice.

How much will you travel? How many bullets will be shooted at you? All of this depends on dice's will.

Are you lucky enough to try this out?

This game is created for GMTK Game Jam 2022

CONTROLS:

Pretty much 99.9% of your game is played by Mouse. All of the controls for it you will find inside the game.

R (before intro texts) - Reset your game progress (saved on your browser)

Special Thanks:
